00015 /**
00016  * validation string define to check if string is not empty
00017  * @deprecated 31.04.2009
00018  */
00019 define('VALID_NOT_EMPTY', '/.+/');
00020 /**
00021  * @deprecated 31.04.2009
00022  * validation string define to check if string is numeric
00023  */
00024 define('VALID_NUMBER', '/^[0-9]+$/');
00025 
00026 /**
00027  * @deprecated 31.04.2009
00028  * validation string define to check if string is an email-address
00029  */
00030 define('VALID_EMAIL', '/\\A(?:^([a-z0-9][a-z0-9_\\-\\.\\+]*)@([a-z0-9][a-z0-9\\.\\-]{0,63}\\.(com|org|net|biz|info|name|net|pro|aero|coop|museum|[a-z]{2,4}))$)\\z/i');
00031 
00032 /**
00033  * @deprecated 31.04.2009
00034  * validation string define to check if string is a numeric year
00035  */
00036 define('VALID_YEAR', '/^[12][0-9]{3}$/');

00038 /**
00039  * The base model-class that all models derive from
00040  * @package kata
00041  */
00042 class Model {
00043              /**
00044               * which connection to use of the ones defines inside config/database.php
00045               * @var string
00046               */
00047              public $connection= 'default';
00048 
00049              /**
00050               * whether to use a specific table for this model. false if not specific, otherwise the tablename
00051               * @var mixed
00052               */
00053              public $useTable= false;
00054 
00055              /**
00056               * the class used to access the database
00057               * @var object
00058               */
00059              protected $dboClass= null;
00060 
00061              /**
00062               * lazy setup dbo the first time its used
00063               * @return object intialized dbo-class
00064               */
00065              function dbo() {
00066                           if (null === $this->dboClass) {
00067                                        $this->setupDbo($this->connection);
00068                           }
00069                           return $this->dboClass;
00070              }
00071 
00072              /**
00073               * load dbo-class, give dbconfig to class
00074               * @param string $connName name of the connection to use
00075               */
00076              protected function setupDbo($connName) {
00077                           require_once (ROOT.'config'.DS.'database.php');
00078                           if (!class_exists('DATABASE_CONFIG')) {
00079                                        throw new Exception('Incorrect config/database.php');
00080                           }
00081 
00082                           $dbvars= get_class_vars('DATABASE_CONFIG');
00083                           $dboname= 'dbo_'.$dbvars[$connName]['driver'];
00084 
00085                           if (!class_exists($dboname)) {
00086                                        kataUse($dboname);
00087                           }
00088                           $this->dboClass= classRegistry :: getObject($dboname, $connName);
00089 
00090                           if (!isset ($this->dboClass->config)) {
00091                                        $this->dboClass->dbconfig= $dbvars[$connName];
00092                           }
00093              }
00094 
00095              /**
00096               * allowes you to switch the current connection dynamically.
00097               *
00098               * @param string $connName name of the new connection to use
00099               */
00100              function changeConnection($connName) {
00101                           $this->connection= $connName;
00102                           $this->setupDbo($connName);
00103              }
00104 
00105              /**
00106               * getter for the config options of the current model
00107               * @var string
00108               */
00109              public function getConfig() {
00110                           return $this->dbo()->dbconfig;
00111              }
00112 
00113              /**
00114               * getter for the database link of the current model. whats returned here depends greatly on the dbo-class
00115               * @var mixed
00116               */
00117              public function getLink() {
00118                           return $this->dbo()->getLink();
00119              }
00120 
00121              /**
00122               * utility function to generate correct tablename
00123               *
00124               * @param string $n tablename to use. if null uses $this->useTable. if that is also null uses modelname.
00125               * @param bool $withPrefix if true adds prefix and adds the correct quote-signs to the name
00126               * @return string
00127               */
00128              private function getTableName($n= null, $withPrefix= true) {
00129                           $name= get_class($this);
00130 
00131                           if ($withPrefix) {
00132                                        if (null !== $n) {
00133                                                     return $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.$this->getPrefix().$n.$this->dbo()->quoteRight;
00134                                        }
00135                                        if ($this->useTable) {
00136                                                     return $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.$this->getPrefix().$this->useTable.$this->dbo()->quoteRight;
00137                                        }
00138                                        return $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.$this->getPrefix().strtolower($name).$this->dbo()->quoteRight;
00139                           }
00140 
00141                           if (null !== $n) {
00142                                        return $n;
00143                           }
00144                           if ($this->useTable) {
00145                                        return $this->useTable;
00146                           }
00147                           return strtolower($name);
00148              }
00149 
00150              /**
00151               * return the prefix configured for this connection
00152               *
00153               * @return string
00154               */
00155              public function getPrefix() {
00156                           if (!empty ($this->dbo()->dboconfig['prefix'])) {
00157                                        return $this->dbo()->dboconfig['prefix'];
00158                           }
00159                           return '';
00160              }
00161 
00162              /**
00163               * execute an actual query on the database
00164               * @param string $s the sql to execute
00165               * @param string $idname can be used to have the keys of the returned array equal the value ob the column given here (instead of just heaving 0..x as keys)
00166               */
00167              function & query($s, $idname= false) {
00168                           return $this->dbo()->query($s, $idname);
00169              }
00170 
00171              /**
00172               * used to cache a reference to the CacheUtility
00173               * @var class
00174               */
00175              private $cacheUtilRef= false;
00176 
00177              /**
00178               * Do a query that is cached via the cacheUtility
00179               *
00180               * @param string $s sql-string
00181               * @param string $idname if set the key of the array is set to the value of this field of the result-array. So the result is not numbered from 0..x but for example the value of the primary key
00182               * @param string $cacheid the id used to store this query in the cache. if ommited we try to build a suitable key
00183               * @param int $ttl time to live in seconds (0=infinite)
00184               */
00185              function & cachedQuery($s, $idname= false, $cacheid= false, $ttl= 0) {
00186                           if (!$cacheid) {
00187                                        $bt= debug_backtrace();
00188                                        $cacheid= $bt[1]['class'].'.'.$bt[1]['function'].'.'.$bt[1]['line'];
00189 
00190                                        if (isset ($bt[1]['args']) && is_array($bt[1]['args'])) {
00191                                                     foreach ($bt[1]['args'] as $arg) {
00192                                                                  if (null === $arg) {
00193                                                                               $cacheid .= '-null';
00194                                                                  }
00195                                                                  elseif (false === $arg) {
00196                                                                               $cacheid .= '-false';
00197                                                                  } else {
00198                                                                               $cacheid .= '-'.$arg;
00199                                                                  }
00200                                                     }
00201                                        }
00202                           }
00203 
00204                           if (!$this->cacheUtilRef) {
00205                                        $this->cacheUtilRef= getUtil('Cache');
00206                           }
00207 
00208                           $res= $this->cacheUtilRef->read($cacheid);
00209                           if (false !== $res) {
00210                                        return $res;
00211                           }
00212 
00213                           $res= $this->query($s, $idname);
00214                           $this->cacheUtilRef->write($cacheid, $res, $ttl);
00215                           return $res;
00216              }
00217 
00218              /**
00219               * escape possibly harmful strings so you can safely append them to an sql-string
00220               */
00221              function escape($s) {
00222                           return $this->dbo()->escape($s);
00223              }
00224 
00225              /**
00226               * enclose string in quotes and escape it
00227               */
00228              function quote($s) {
00229                           return '\''.$this->dbo()->escape($s).'\'';
00230              }

00237              function makeDateTime($t) {

00241              /**
00242               * convenience method for writeLog
00243               * @param string $what what to log
00244               * @param string $where where to log (KATA_DEBUG OR KATA_ERROR)
00245               */
00246              function log($what, $where) {
00247                           writeLog($what, $where);
00248              }
00249 
00250              /**
00251               * turn the given array into "name=value,name=value" pairs suitable for INSERT or UPDATE-sqls. strings are automatically escaped
00252               * @param array $params the data
00253               */
00254              function pairs($params) {
00255                           if (!is_array($params)) {
00256                                        throw new InvalidArgumentException('pairs: params must be an array');
00257                           }
00258                           $out= '';
00259                           foreach ($params as $v => $k) {
00260                                        if (is_null($k)) {
00261                                                     $out .= $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.$v.$this->dbo()->quoteRight."=NULL,";
00262                                        } else {
00263                                                     $out .= $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.$v.$this->dbo()->quoteRight."=".$this->quote($k).",";
00264                                        }
00265                           }
00266                           return substr($out, 0, strlen($out) - 1);
00267              }
00268 
00269              /**
00270               * construct a suitable where-clause for a query
00271               * @param mixed $id
00272               * @param string $tableName needed to generate a primary key name
00273               * @return string full 'WHERE x=' string
00274               */
00275              function getWhereString(& $id, $tableName) {
00276                           if (empty ($id)) {
00277                                        return '';
00278                           }
00279                           return ' WHERE '.$this->getWhereStringHelper($id, $tableName);
00280              }
00281 
00282              /**
00283               * do the actual work for getWhereString(). analyse strings and branch for arrays
00284               * @param mixed $id
00285               * @param string $tableName needed to generate a primary key name
00286               * @return string 'x=y AND x=z' string without 'WHERE'
00287               */
00288              function getWhereStringHelper(& $id, $tableName) {
00289                           if (!is_array($id)) {
00290                                        return $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.'id'.$this->dbo()->quoteRight.'='.$this->quote($id);
00291                           }
00292 
00293                           $orMode= in_array('or', $id);
00294                           reset($id);
00295 
00296                           $num= 0;
00297                           $s = '';
00298                           $skipBoolean = true;
00299                           foreach ($id as $name => $value) {
00300                                        $num++;
00301 
00302                                        if (!$skipBoolean) {//&& ($num != count($id))) {
00303                                                     $s .= ($orMode ? ' OR ' : ' AND ');
00304                                        }
00305 
00306                                        if (!is_array($value) && (('or' == strtolower($value)) || ('and' == strtolower($value)))) {
00307                                                     $skipBoolean=true;
00308                                                     continue;
00309                                        }
00310                                        $temp= explode(' ', $name);
00311 
00312                                        if ((count($temp) > 1)) {
00313                                                     $operator= strtolower($temp[1]);
00314 
00315                                                     if ($operator == 'in') {
00316                                                                  if (!is_array($value)) {
00317                                                                               throw new Exception($name.' needs to have array() as value');
00318                                                                  }
00319                                                                  $s .= $temp[0].' IN (\''.implode('\',\'', $value).'\')';
00320                                                                  $skipBoolean=false;
00321                                                                  continue;
00322                                                     }
00323                                                     if (in_array($operator, array (
00324                                                                               '>',
00325                                                                               '<',
00326                                                                               '<>',
00327                                                                               '>=',
00328                                                                               '<=',
00329                                                                               'like'
00330                                                                  ))) {
00331                                                                  $s .= $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.$temp[0].$this->dbo()->quoteRight.' '.$operator.' '.$this->quote($value);
00332                                                                  $skipBoolean=false;
00333                                                                  continue;
00334                                                     }
00335 
00336                                        }//count($temp)
00337 
00338                                        if (is_array($value)) {
00339                                                     $s .= ' ( '.$this->getWhereStringHelper($value, $tableName).' ) ';
00340                                                     $skipBoolean=false;
00341                                                     continue;
00342                                        }
00343 
00344                                        $s .= $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.$name.$this->dbo()->quoteRight.'='.$this->quote($value);
00345                                        $skipBoolean=false;
00346                           } //foreach
00347 
00348                           return $s;
00349              }
00350 
00351              /**
00352               * select rows using various methods (see $method for full list)
00353               *
00354               * <code>
00355               * $rows = $this->find('all',array(
00356               *           'conditions' => array( // WHERE conditions to use. default all elements are AND, just add 'or' to the condition-array to change this
00357               *                        'field' => $thisValue,
00358               *                        'or',
00359               *                        'field2'=>$value2,
00360               *                        'field3'=>$value3,
00361               *                        'field4'=>$value4
00362               *           ),
00363               *           'fields' => array( //array of field names that we should return. first field name is used as array-key if you use method 'list' and listby is unset
00364               *                        'field1',
00365               *                        'field2'
00366               *           ),
00367               *  'order' => array( //string or array defining order. you can add DESC or ASC
00368               *                        'created',
00369               *                        'field3 DESC'
00370               *           ),
00371               *  'group' => array( //fields to GROUP BY
00372               *                        'field'
00373               *           ),
00374               *  'listby' => array( //only if find('list'): fields to arrange result-array by
00375               *                        'field1','field2'
00376               *  ),
00377               *  'limit' => 50, //int, how many rows per page
00378               *  'page' => 1, //int, which page, starting at 1
00379               * ),'mytable');
00380               * </code>
00381               *
00382               * @param string $method can be 'all','list','count','first','neighbors'
00383               * @param array $params see example
00384               * @param mixed $tableName string or null to use modelname
00385               */
00386              function find($method, $params= array (), $tableName= null) {
00387                           $orderBy= '';
00388                           if (!empty ($params['order'])) {
00389                                        if (!is_array($params['order'])) {
00390                                                     throw new InvalidArgumentException('order must be an array');
00391                                        }
00392                                        $orderBy= ' ORDER BY '.implode(',', $params['order']);
00393                           }
00394                           $groupBy= '';
00395                           if (!empty ($params['group'])) {
00396                                        if (!is_array($params['group'])) {
00397                                                     throw new InvalidArgumentException('group must be an array');
00398                                        }
00399                                        $groupBy= ' GROUP BY '.implode(',', $params['group']);
00400                           }
00401                           $fields= '*';
00402                           if (!empty ($params['fields'])) {
00403                                        if (!is_array($params['fields'])) {
00404                                                     throw new InvalidArgumentException('fields must be an array');
00405                                        }
00406                                        $fields= implode(',', $params['fields']);
00407                           }
00408                           $where= '';
00409                           if (!empty ($params['conditions'])) {
00410                                        if (!is_array($params['conditions'])) {
00411                                                     throw new InvalidArgumentException('conditions must be an array');
00412                                        }
00413                                        $where= $this->getWhereString($params['conditions'], $tableName);
00414                           }
00415 
00416                           $indexFields= false;
00417                           switch ($method) {
00418                                        case 'list' :
00419                                                     if (empty ($params['listby'])) {
00420                                                                  if (empty ($params['field'])) {
00421                                                                               reset($params['fields']);
00422                                                                               $indexFields= array(key($params['fields']));
00423                                                                  } else {
00424                                                                               $indexFields= array('id');
00425                                                                  }
00426                                                     } else {
00427                                                                  if (!is_array($params['listby'])) {
00428                                                                               throw new InvalidArgumentException('listby must be an array');
00429                                                                  }
00430                                                                  $indexFields= $params['listby'];
00431                                                     }
00432 
00433                                        case 'all' :
00434                                                     $sql= 'SELECT '.$fields.' FROM '.$this->getTableName($tableName).$where.$orderBy.$groupBy;
00435                                                     if (!empty ($params['page']) && is_numeric($params['page'])) {
00436                                                                  $page= (int) $params['page'];
00437                                                                  $perPage= 50;
00438                                                                  if (!empty ($params['limit']) && is_numeric($params['limit'])) {
00439                                                                               $perPage= $params['limit'];
00440                                                                  }
00441                                                                  $sql= $this->dbo()->getPageQuery($sql, $page, $perPage);
00442                                                     }
00443                                                     return $this->query($sql, $indexFields);
00444                                                     break;
00445 
00446                                        case 'count' :
00447                                                     $r= $this->query('SELECT count(*) AS c FROM '.$this->getTableName($tableName).$where);
00448                                                     return isset ($r[0]['c']) ? $r[0]['c'] : 0;
00449                                                     break;
00450 
00451                                        case 'first' :
00452                                                     $sql= 'SELECT '.$fields.' FROM '.$this->getTableName($tableName).$where.$orderBy.$groupBy;
00453                                                     $sql= $this->dbo()->getPageQuery($sql, 1, 1);
00454                                                     return $this->query($sql);
00455                                                     break;
00456 
00457                                        case 'neighbors' :
00458                                                     die('not implemented yet');
00459                                                     break;
00460 
00461                                        default :
00462                                                     throw new InvalidArgumentException('model: find() doesnt know method '.$method);
00463                                                     break;
00464                           }
00465              }
00466 
00467              /**
00468               * read data from the database.
00469               * <code>
00470               * $rows = $this->read(5);
00471               * $rows = $this->read(array('foobarId'=>5));
00472               * $rows = $this->read(array(
00473               *           'foobarId'=>6,
00474               *  'and',
00475               *  'someId'=>2
00476               * ));
00477               *
00478               * </code>
00479               *
00480               * @param mixed $id read the row with this primary key (if null: all rows)
00481               * @param array $fields return these colums (if null: all fields)
00482               * @param string $tableName read from this table (if ommitted: use tablename of this model, including prefix)
00483               */
00484              function read($id= null, $fields= null, $tableName= null) {
00485                           $fieldName= false;
00486 
00487                           if (($fields !==null) && !is_array($fields)) {
00488                                        throw new InvalidArgumentException('fields must be an array');
00489 
00490                           }
00491 
00492                           return $this->query('SELECT '.
00493                            ($fields == null ? '*' : implode(',', $fields)).
00494                           ' FROM '.$this->getTableName($tableName).
00495                           $this->getWhereString($id, $tableName), $fieldName);
00496              }
00497 
00498              /**
00499               * insert a record into the database.
00500               *
00501               * <code>
00502               * $this->create(array('fooId'=>1,'int1'=>10,'int2'=>20));
00503               * </code>
00504               *
00505               * @param array $fields name=>value pairs to be inserted into the table
00506               * @param string $tableName insert into this table (if ommitted: use tablename of this model, including prefix)
00507               */
00508              function create($fields, $tableName= null) {
00509                           $fieldstr= '';
00510                           $valuestr= '';
00511                           if (!is_array($fields)) {
00512                                        throw new InvalidArgumentException('fields must be an array');
00513                           }
00514                           foreach ($fields as $fieldname => $value) {
00515                                        $fieldstr .= $this->dbo()->quoteLeft.$fieldname.$this->dbo()->quoteRight.',';
00516                                        $valuestr .= $this->quote($value).',';
00517                           }
00518 
00519                           return $this->query('INSERT INTO '.
00520                           $this->getTableName($tableName).
00521                           ' ('.substr($fieldstr, 0, -1).') VALUES ('.substr($valuestr, 0, -1).')');
00522              }
00523 
00524              /**
00525               * delete the row whose id is matching
00526               *
00527               * <code>
00528               * $this->delete(5);
00529               * $this->delete(array('rowId'=>10));
00530               * $this->delete(array(
00531               *           'rowId'=>20,
00532               *           'and',
00533               *  'parentId'=>10
00534               * ));
00535               * </code>
00536               *
00537               * @param mixed $id primary key of row to delete
00538               * @param string $tableName delete from this table (if ommitted: use tablename of this model, including prefix)
00539               */
00540              function delete($id, $tableName= null) {
00541                           if (empty ($id)) {
00542                                        throw new InvalidArgumentException('delete without id, seems odd');
00543                           }
00544                           return $this->query('DELETE FROM '.
00545                           $this->getTableName($tableName).
00546                           $this->getWhereString($id, $tableName));
00547              }
00548 
00549              /**
00550               * update a row whose id is matching
00551               *
00552               * <code>
00553               * $this->update(array(
00554               *           'fooId'=>10,
00555               *  'data1'=>20
00556               * ));
00557               * </code>
00558               *
00559               * @param mixed $id primary key of row to update
00560               * @param array $fields name=>value pairs of new values
00561               * @param string $tableName update data in this table (if ommitted: use tablename of this model, including prefix)
00562               */
00563              function update($id, $fields, $tableName= null) {
00564                           return $this->query('UPDATE '.
00565                           $this->getTableName($tableName).
00566                           ' SET '.$this->pairs($fields).
00567                           $this->getWhereString($id, $tableName));
00568              }
00569 
00570              /**
00571               * update a row or insert a new record if no previous row is found
00572               *
00573               * <code>
00574               * $this->replace(array(
00575               *           'fooId'=>10,
00576               *  'data1'=>20
00577               * ));
00578               * </code>
00579               *
00580               * @param mixed $id primary key of row to replace
00581               * @param array $fields name=>value pairs of new values
00582               * @param string $table replace from this table (if ommitted: use tablename of this model, including prefix)
00583               */
00584              function replace($fields, $tableName= null) {
00585                           return $this->query('REPLACE INTO '.
00586                           $this->getTableName($tableName).
00587                           ' SET '.$this->pairs($fields));
00588              }
00589 
00590              /**
00591               * tries to reduce all fields of the given table to basic datatypes
00592               *
00593               * @param string $tableName optional tablename to use
00594               * @return array
00595               */
00596              function & describe($tableName= null) {
00597                           $tableName= $this->getTableName($tableName);
00598 
00599                           $cacheUtil= getUtil('Cache');
00600                           $cacheId= 'describe.'.$this->connection.'.'.$tableName;
00601                           $data= $cacheUtil->read($cacheId, CacheUtility :: CM_FILE);
00602                           if (false !== $data) {
00603                                        return $data;
00604                           }
00605 
00606                           $data= $this->dbo()->describe($tableName);
00607                           $cacheUtil->write($cacheId, $data, MINUTE, CacheUtility :: CM_FILE);
00608                           return $data;
00609              }
00610 
00611              /**
00612               * checks the given values of the array match certain criterias
00613               * @param array $params key/value pair. key is the name of the key inside the $what-array, value is a "VALID_" define (see above) or the name of a function that is given the string (should return bool wether the string validates)
00614               * @param array $what the actual data
00615               * @deprecated 31.04.2009
00616               */
00617              function validate($params, $what) {
00618                           if (!is_array($params)) {
00619                                        return false;
00620                           }
00621                           foreach ($params as $param => $how) {
00622                                        if (!isset ($what[$param])) {
00623                                                     return $how;
00624                                        }
00625                                        if (function_exists($how)) {
00626                                                     if (!$how ($what[$param])) {
00627                                                                  return $how;
00628                                                     }
00629                                        } else {
00630                                                     if (!preg_match($how, $what[$param])) {
00631                                                                  return $how;
00632                                                     }
00633                                        }
00634                           }
00635                           return true;
00636              }
00637 }
00638 
00639 /**
00640  * our own exception so user can react to connection-errors
00641  */
00642 class DatabaseConnectException extends Exception {
00643 
00644 }
00645 
00646 /**
00647  * our own sql-error exception so user can react to bad queries
00648  */
00649 class DatabaseErrorException extends Exception {
00650 
00651 }
